script:
1). I'm not going to get laid off, am I?
Yes, you need to lie down.
Yes, you're not.
No, not at this time. 
2). Did they mention getting new uniforms?
No, they didn't. 
No, they did.
No, they mentioned it.
3). Why are you running late?
I like to run after work.
I'm going to be early.
Traffic is horrible.
